languages.text: "...И прошептал Неумирающий Император: "Благородных ткачей нарекаю вестниками воли своей в пустоте меж звезд..."

traits.locale_text: "...И рек Неумирающий Император: "Почтенных ткачей нарекаю вестниками воли своей в пустоте меж звезд..."

languages.text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"
languages.original_text: "...И прошептал Неумирающий Император: "Благородных ткачей нарекаю вестниками воли своей в пустоте меж звезд..."

traits.locale_text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted weavers heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"
"...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted weavers heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"
"...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"
"...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"
"...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"
"...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"

languages.text: « ... Et l'Empereur Immortel a murmuré : "Les tisseurs exaltés seront les hérauts de Ma volonté entre les étoiles..." »
languages.original_text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"

traits.locale_text: « ... Et l'Empereur Immortel a murmuré : "Les tisseurs exaltés seront les hérauts de Ma volonté entre les étoiles..." »

languages.text: «... Y el Inmortal susurró: "Nombro a los tejedores exaltados heraldos de mi voluntad en el vacío del Universo..."».
languages.original_text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"

traits.locale_text: «... Y el Inmortal susurró: "Nombro a los tejedores exaltados heraldos de mi voluntad en el vacío del Universo..."».

languages.text: 「…そして不死の皇帝は囁いた、『私は星と星の間の虚空で、高貴なる織り手達に我が意志の使者という名前を与える…』」
languages.original_text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"

traits.locale_text: 「…そして不死の皇帝は囁いた、『私は星と星の間の虚空で、高貴なる織り手達に我が意志の使者という名前を与える…』」

languages.text: “……于是不死神皇低语道：‘我任命尊贵的织网者为我的先导，在群星与虚空之中代表我的意志……’”
languages.original_text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"

traits.locale_text: “……于是不死神皇低语道：‘我任命尊贵的织网者为我的先导，在群星与虚空之中代表我的意志……’”

languages.text: "... und der Todlose Imperator flüsterte: 'Ich ernenne die erhabenen Weber zu Herolden meines Willens in der Leere zwischen den Sternen' ..."
languages.original_text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"

traits.locale_text: "... und der Todlose Imperator flüsterte: 'Ich ernenne die erhabenen Weber zu Herolden meines Willens in der Leere zwischen den Sternen' ..."

languages.text: "Ardından Ölmeyen İmparator fısıldadı: 'Yüce dokurları, arzularımın yıldızlar arasında uzanan uçsuzdaki habercileri ilan ediyorum...'"
languages.original_text: "...And the Undying Emperor whispered, 'I name the exalted spinners heralds of my will in the void between the stars...'"
